name: San Francisco Scholarships
description: Bay Area young scholarship programs for: - Writers Scholarship Program: Ages 9-13 - Teen Fellowship Scholarship Program: Ages 14-18 Offering 25 scholarships for passionate writers and 10 scholarships for reluctant or struggling writers. This is not a needs-based scholarship but we do encourage those with financial need to respond to the optional question about circumstance.

howToGetIt: To apply fill out ONLINE APPLICATION Eligibility requirements 1) Bay Area residency; 2) ability to regularly attend in person workshops in San Francisco; 3) writing samples and a short essay (see application); 4) a teacher or community member's written recommendation
